channel.title: KontinuumLab Contributions
channel.description:
Github user: KontinuumLab prefix: klab
objects: klab/decode/bin4_to_int. Read 4 boolean inlets as binary. Output int: 0-15 klab/decode/bin8_to_int. Read 8 boolean inlets as binary. Output int: 0-255
klab/logic/last_rising_4. Output an int corresponding to the last of 4 boolean inlets to see a rising edge klab/logic/last_rising_8. Same, with 8 inlets.

item.title: KontinuumLab Contributions
item.dc:creator: @KontinuumLab Jeppe
item.description:
@KontinuumLab wrote:

Github user: KontinuumLab
prefix: klab

objects:
klab/decode/bin4_to_int. Read 4 boolean inlets as binary. Output int: 0-15
klab/decode/bin8_to_int. Read 8 boolean inlets as binary. Output int: 0-255

klab/logic/last_rising_4. Output an int corresponding to the last of 4 boolean inlets to see a rising edge
klab/logic/last_rising_8. Same, with 8 inlets.
